question: A lent 5000 Rs. to B for 2 years and 3000 Rs. to C for 4 years on simple interest at the same rate of interest and received 2200 Rs. in all from both as interest. The rate of interest per annum is :
explanation:
Let the rate of the interest per annum be r%
According to the question, 
$latex \\frac{5000\\times 2\\times r}{100}+\\frac{3000\\times 4\\times r}{100} = 2200&s=1$
$latex => 100r +120r = 2200&s=1$
$latex => 220r = 2200&s=1$
$latex => r = \\frac{2200}{220} = 10\\%&s=1$
Hence option [B] is the right answer.
